Articles.Content:
Released in 2004, this deck of Top Trumps cards had a few... inaccuracies. It won't come off nearly as well if I try to explain it, so just watch (contains strong language, for good reason):

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/1Us3iSgixRI?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

I had to pause the video to laugh for several minutes after the Venus card. Absolutely unreal.
